setting.name: Init Command
setting.description: Any values that need to be in the command line for initialising the XeTeX rendering engine.

setting.name: PDF Viewer Command
setting.description: The command needed to view the PDF output created by this module. The default is taken from the rapuma system configuration file.

setting.name: Freeze TeX Settings
setting.description: For debugging purposes, prevent the XeTeX manager from recreating the main TeX settings file. Default = False

setting.name: Run External XeTeX
setting.description: Run a system installed version of XeTeX rather than Rapuma's internal version.

setting.name: Debug KPSE
setting.description: This is a developer feature that helps diagnose path and other issues with XeTeX. Refer to the following URL for documentation on what debugging can be done and what integer value to enter: http://www.dcs.ed.ac.uk/home/latex/Informatics/Obsolete/html/kpathsea/kpathsea.html
